articles.title: Tributes as Leicester's Manjula Sood - UK's first female Asian lord mayor - dies - BBC
articles.description: Councillor Manjula Sood, who served Leicester throughout her political career, dies aged 80.
articles.content:
Manjula Sood was described as "an inspiration" and "community leader"
Tributes have been paid after the death of a councillor who became the UK's first female Asian lord mayor.
